cause.description:
Anyone with any type of pituitary disorder is welcome to join, as well as any health care professionals that may have valuable knowledge about pituitary disorders. Everyone is welcome. Please post any concerns or questions that you have so that others can benefit from our shared knowledge.
This cause is especially meaningful to me as I have Hypopituitarism. There doesn't seem to be a lot known about it. Let's try and change that!
1. Pituitary disorders are treatable and no one should have to go through it alone.
cause.mission: To provide a place where people with pituitary disorders can turn for support.
cause.name: Pituitary Disorders
